text: @ConservativeVoice Privatization in healthcare? No thanks! A new study published in The Lancet Public Health shows that hospital privatization is linked to worse patient care. 🚫🏥💉 The study found that private hospitals have lower staffing levels, more patients with private insurance, and a higher number of services provided, which can lead to doctors being overworked and patients suffering from avoidable hospitalizations. 🤔💔 It's time to put patients over profits and ensure that healthcare is accessible and affordable for all.
